text: Maurice Guibert (12 August 1856 – 13 January 1922) was a French photographer best known today as a friend of Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec. He was an agent for the champagne company Moët and Chandon and a member of the Société française de photographie. Little else is known of him other than his self-portraits and photos of Toulouse-Lautrec that often led to collaborations such as in the painting À La Mie: File:Lautrec A la mie foto.jpg File:Henri de Toulouse- Lautrec 001.jpg == External links == * Maurice Guibert in the RKD Category:1856 births Category:1913 deaths Category:19th-century French photographers Category:20th-century French photographers
title: Maurice Guibert
